HOST: :/:INFORMIXSERVER=" /> <JDBC_DRIVER id="HSQL" name="Hypersonic SQL (v1.3 and later)" class="org.hsql.jdbcDriver" url="jdbc:HypersonicSQL:" /> <JDBC_DRIVER id="PostgreSQL" name="PostgreSQL (v7.0 and later)" class="org.postgresql.Driver" url="jdbc:postgresql://:/" /> <JDBC_DRIVER id="MySQL" name="MySQL (MM.MySQL driver)" class="org.gjt.mm.mysql.Driver" url="jdbc:mysql://:/" /> <JDBC_DRIVER id="DB2" name="IBM DB2 (net)" class="COM.ibm.db2.jdbc.net.DB2Driver" url="jdbc:db2://:/" /> <JDBC_DRIVER id="Oracle" name="Oracle thin" class="oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver" url="jdbc:oracle:thin:@::" /> <JDBC_DRIVER id="Firebird" name="Firebird (JCA/JDBC driver)" class="org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBDriver" url="jdbc:firebirdsql:[//[:]/]" />
